name: Loom
description: Integrate with Loom to list, get, delete and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Videos
tools.description: List Loom videos owned by the authenticated user. Returns video names, durations, and share links.

tools.name: Get Video
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Loom video including its share link, duration, and view count.

tools.name: Delete Video
tools.description: Delete a Loom video by its ID. This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

tools.name: Get Transcript
tools.description: Get the transcript of a Loom video. Returns the full text transcript with timestamps.
